Content:
Amsterdam City Spring Breeze | Yamaha tracer 7 | GoPro 12 |

Riding the Yamaha Tracer 7 this nice Easter Monday afternoon.
Cruising the City and watch spring bringing everything back alive.
Trying some alternate routes here and there showing a couple of lesser know but very nice little streets.

Hope you enjoy watching the video as it was for me making it.

Filmed with my new GoPro 12
Testing the back facing mic of the GoPro media mod, going slow the wind noise is much less it seems.
I think my helmet is now making the most wind noise when I go faster.
